title: Solution, Suspension and Colloid
question:
Foam - Shaving cream / 
Busa - Krim pencukur

Emulsion – milk, mayonnaise / 
Emulsi – susu, mayonis

Water + Copper sulphate / 
Air + Kuprum sulfat

Water + Chalk powder / 
Air + Serbuk kapur

no residue left / 
tidak meninggalkan sebarang sisa

will settle if left undisturbed and leave residue / 
akan mendak di dasar jika dibiarkan seketika dan meninggalkan sisa
